New Records: New Zealand's lowest total against India in a full-length T20I
Second-most overs bowled by spinners in any T20I, and the most in a game involving Full Member teams
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav steered India home with an unbeaten 26 off 31 balls
India won by 6 wickets with 1 ball remaining
Yuzvendra Chahal set the tone for India with a wicket maiden inside the powerplay
Kuldeep Yadav shattered New Zealand's hopes of recovery by breaching Daryl Mitchell's defense
Arshdeep Singh and Hardik Pandya used bouncers effectively in the death overs to pick up three wickets
Pre-Game Insights: Mitchell Santner opted to bat after winning the toss
India brought in Yuzvendra Chahal for Umran Malik, giving them four spin-bowling options
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Ekana Stadium had hosted five T20Is before this match, with the team batting first winning on all five occasions
